think_procedure: The description of the knob 'autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age' does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob. It only specifies that the knob sets the maximum age for a table's pg_class.relminmxid field before a VACUUM operation is forced. The knob can only be set at server start and can be reduced for individual tables. There is no mention of a value that would disable a feature or change the function of the knob.
